===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# An [[administrative]] [[subdivision]] of [[imperial]], [[republican]], and [[communist]] [[China]], [[typically]] [[translated]] as "[[county]]" but [[now]] [[generally]] [[restrict]]ed to [[rural]] [[area]]s, [[contrast]]ed with the [[urban]] "[[district]]s" ([[區]])
# {{lb|zh|in many cases but not always}} The [[town]] which [[serve]]s as the [[seat of government]] of [[such]] [[subdivision]]s, the "[[county seat]]"

====See also====

* {{sense|second-level divisions}} {{zh-l|區}}; {{zh-l|州}}, {{zh-l|市}}, {{zh-l|府}}, {{zh-l|郡}}, {{zh-l|道}} {{qualifier|historical}}
